mapper.select: SELECT a.icomment, b.iuser, b.nm, a.COMMENT, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_at, '%Y.%m.%d') createdAt FROM t_board_comment a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE iboard = #{iboard} ORDER BY icomment DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board_comment(iboard, iuser, COMMENT) VALUES(#{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{comment})
